title: REINVENTION - THE DATA-DRIVEN CHAPTER (2023-Present)
description: Career reinvention at 45: from entrepreneur to Amazon leadership and Data Science studies during the AI revolution

newBeginning.label: New Beginning
newBeginning.description: Proving it is never too late

timeline.event: Joined Amazon as Sortation Team Leader
timeline.description: Entered Amazon's logistics operations, leading sortation processes and teams
Advanced to Flow operations, managing end-to-end package flow and team coordination

timeline.event: Started Data Science Degree at UNIR
timeline.description: Enrolled in Bachelor's Degree in Data Science at Universidad Internacional de La Rioja while working full-time
Transitioned to Inventory Control & Quality Assurance, combining data analysis with operations management

education.university: UNIR - Universidad Internacional de La Rioja
education.motivation: Combining operational experience with data analytics to drive career transformation

aiRevolution.title: The AI Revolution Context
aiRevolution.description: The period of the greatest technological disruption since the internet, transforming every industry

milestones.event: ChatGPT reaches 100M users in 2 months, fastest adoption ever
AI integration everywhere: coding, design, writing, analysis
AI agents begin handling complex multi-step tasks autonomously
Data literacy becomes essential skill across all industries

careerChangersByAge.title: Career Changers by Age Group (%)
careerChangersByAge.description: Distribution of career changers and their success rates by age

keyEvents.description: Generative AI becomes mainstream; ChatGPT reaches 100M users; every company scrambles to integrate AI
AI becomes embedded in daily work tools; Microsoft Copilot, Google Gemini, and Claude transform productivity
At 47, starting a university degree in Data Science at UNIR - proving reinvention has no age limit

reinventionContext.title: Career Reinvention at 45+

statistics.averageCareerChanges: 12 job changes in a lifetime (modern worker)
statistics.midCareerChangers: 33% of workers over 40 consider major career shifts

personalAdvantages: 20+ years of professional experience across multiple industries
Creative background enables unique data visualization perspective
Leadership experience managing teams and operations
Real-world business understanding that pure tech graduates lack

dataDriven.label: Data-Driven Career Path
dataDriven.education: Lifelong learning, degree at any age

comparison2024.keyInsight: The most valuable professionals in 2024+ combine domain expertise with data literacy - exactly the path being built here

globalDataCreated.description: Global data creation in zettabytes per year

amazonContext.title: Amazon Operations - Where Data Meets Action
amazonContext.description: Amazon's fulfillment centers are among the most data-intensive environments in the world
dataPoints: Every package tracked through 20+ data checkpoints
Real-time dashboards drive operational decisions every 15 minutes
Predictive models optimize staffing, routing, and inventory
Machine learning algorithms manage millions of SKUs daily
amazonContext.relevanceToDataScience: Working at Amazon provides firsthand experience with data-driven operations at massive scale - the perfect complement to academic Data Science studies

funFacts: Starting a university degree at 47 means being older than most professors
The AI tools used to build this portfolio did not exist 2 years ago
Amazon processes more data in one day than most companies do in a year
A career spanning design, entrepreneurship, and data science is surprisingly coherent - it is all about finding patterns
The average data scientist spends 80% of their time cleaning data - entrepreneurship was good preparation for messy reality
UNIR online classes at midnight after Amazon shifts is the definition of commitment
At Amazon, the phrase 'the data says' wins more arguments than any opinion
Going from pesetas to euros to Bitcoin to AI tokens - one lifetime, four economic paradigms
